CustomField.description: If there is a database script to be run as part of the change and this is a script that has not been reviewed by development before, then this should be Y. If yes need to notify Tim Beaulieau that a resource is needed to he can assign task to a dev resource. And a 7th arficat is required which is the Custom Script.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If there is a database script to be run as part of the change and this is a script that has not been reviewed by development before, then this should be set to "Yes"
CustomField.label: Custom Script
